Html:
I reinstalled WSUS und Package Publisher, afterwards I created a new Certificate and rolled it out via GPO and restarted the services. I double-checked if the cert was in the correct cert folders but I still get this error message everytime I start PP and it tries to connect to my WSUS.

Any suggestions?
Hi, could you tick the option «Ignore code signing certificate errors» in the options. Then try to publish an update.
